personal_info.name: Alex Developer
personal_info.title: Full-Stack Engineer
personal_info.summary: Engineer focused on resilient web applications and thoughtful developer experience.

achievements: Led migration of critical services to asynchronous FastAPI stack, cutting latency by 40%.
Built CI/CD templates used by seven teams to standardize testing and deployment.
Mentored five engineers through promotion paths with structured growth plans.
Developed data ingestion pipelines processing 2B+ events per day with robust monitoring.
Launched client-facing dashboards with React and D3, improving retention by 12%.
Partnered with design to deliver accessible UI patterns reused across four products.
